# R&J Landscaping

> R&J Landscaping is a fully insured, locally owned landscaping company serving Olivette, Creve Coeur, and surrounding communities in St. Louis County, Missouri. Founded in 2023.

## About

R&J Landscaping LLC provides professional lawn care, landscaping maintenance, and snow removal services to residential and commercial properties in western St. Louis County, Missouri. The company is fully insured and has been serving the community since 2023. R&J Landscaping is known for reliable service, competitive pricing, and comprehensive year-round property maintenance.

## Services

- **Lawn Mowing**: Weekly and bi-weekly professional mowing for residential and commercial properties
- **Lawn Edging**: Precision edging along sidewalks, driveways, and garden beds
- **Spring Clean Up**: Comprehensive spring yard cleanup including debris removal and bed preparation
- **Mulching**: Professional mulch supply and installation for garden beds and landscaped areas
- **Trimming & Pruning**: Expert trimming and pruning of bushes, shrubs, hedges, and small trees
- **Aeration & Overseeding**: Core aeration and overseeding to promote thick, healthy lawns
- **Fall Cleanup**: Complete fall yard cleanup including leaf removal and winterization prep
- **Snow Removal**: Winter snow removal for driveways, sidewalks, parking lots, and commercial properties

## Service Areas

- Olivette, MO (primary)
- Creve Coeur, MO (primary)
- Ladue, MO
- University City, MO
- Overland, MO
- Greater St. Louis County, MO
